name: Wanted in fifty states
description:
Wanted

In Fifty States

Wanted in fifty states was made for the game dev: replicate game jam where we had a set amount of time to make a game about a theme and thus time around the theme was "The Last  Night" this is a new cyberpunk pixel art game coming out. When watch the trailer i felt the protagonist was some sort of gangsta  evading police robots and what not, any way also seeing futuristic cars in  the trailer lead m. to make Wanted in fifty states.

The game runs on the concept of upgrading your car in order to not crash into other cars around you. the Tyre Upgrade help you move on the y axis while the engine  makes you faster on the x axis. 

UpUp Arrow KeysDownDown Arrow  Keys

Hope you enjoy the game and if  you do could you vote for our game in the public poles of the game Jam.

Questions or enquiry: high_rise_help@outlook.com

Thanks, Highrise
